variants.Description in input context: (description of the variant from the literature)

Material used.Material Source: (source of the material used, e.g., cell line)
Material used.Material Name: (name of the material used, e.g., HEK293)
Material used.Description: (description of how the material was used)

Readout description.Conclusion: (conclusion about the effect of the variant on the readout)
Readout description.Molecular Effect: (molecular effect of the variant, e.g., partial loss-of-function)
Readout description.Result Description: (description of the experimental result for each variant mentioned in the literature or listed in 'Variants Include')

Basic positive control.Basic positive control: (whether a basic positive control was set up)

Basic negative control.Basic negative control: (whether a basic negative control was set up)

Validation controls P/LP.Validation controls P/LP: (whether validation controls for pathogenic/likely pathogenic variants were included)

Validation controls B/LB.Validation controls B/LB: (whether validation controls for benign/likely benign variants were included)

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: (description of the statistical analysis method used in the experimental protocol)

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: (threshold for normal results in the literature, e.g., 'Protein expression greater than 80% on day 7')

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: (threshold for abnormal results in the literature, e.g., 'Protein expression less than 50% on day 7')

Approved assay.Approved assay: (whether the experimental protocol used in the literature is generally used for studying this disease)
